mapper.update: update LAND_CLASSIFICATION set PRIMARY_IDENTIFIER = #{primaryIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIMARY_NAME = #{primaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER = #{secondaryIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECONDARY_NAME = #{secondaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECONDARY_MEANINGS = #{secondaryMeanings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, PRIMARY_IDENTIFIER, PRIMARY_NAME, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER, SECONDARY_NAME, SECONDARY_MEANINGS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_CLASSIFICATION where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, PRIMARY_IDENTIFIER, PRIMARY_NAME, SECONDARY_IDENTIFIER, SECONDARY_NAME, SECONDARY_MEANINGS, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_CLASSIFICATION
